text.data: Chapter 23 Destruction[end]
Hello there! It's been a while! Okay, [character][0x0], this way![end]

A kingdom might be destroyed! Or the entire world might be destroyed by monsters! Even at a time like this, a new life will be born! The mysteries of life!
That's why I'm retiring as a battlefield salesman.
Now I'm a salesman who's going to protect his wife and child. Hey you![end]
Here you go, Rush. Wow, this is heavy![end]
Who are you...[end]

From what I've seen, you'd make a good salesman.
But I think you should think a little more before you act... If you do that, you're sure to be a huge success![end]
Truce! You think too much. Think in moderation. And help Rush.[end]
Rush, Truce! If you two work together you can accomplish anything![end]
Bikkebakke: What about me...?[end]
Bikkebakke: I'm so happy!![end]
......!? Unless![end]
Bikkebakke! I like you a lot! You're good just the way you are now![end]
Bikkebakke: Yay! It's all thanks to you, [character][0x0]! Thanks a lot![end]
Wife-and-child-protecting Salesman: [character][0x0]! Thanks for everything! I will pray for your safety! Goodbye, everyone! Thanks![end]

Oh, I almost forgot!
Bikkebakke, you gave some money to an old man in Campbell, didn't you?[end]
He said he'd give you 1000 times as much!! That's great! He gave it to me to give to you! Here you go! 1000 Piro![end]
Chapter 25 Eternal Travelers[end]
Matelite: [character][0x0]... Stay on guard...[end]
[character][0x1]: [character][0x0]! I'm worried about General Palpaleos! Let's go right away![end]
I'm not ready... Oh well, lets go! Okay, let's go![end1]
Palpaleos: Sorry... We're too late...[end]
[character][0x1]: I'm scared... The Holy Dragons are angry... Even more intensely than before...[end]
[character][0x1]: Where are the Dragonites... The Holy Dragons are searching for them...[end]
[character][0x1]: What happened on Altair... The Holy Dragons want to know...[end]

Palpaleos: [character][0x0]. Have you finished our preparations?
Hold on a minute. Let's go!![end1]
Palpaleos: I know very little of this place...[end]

Sorry... I don't know anything about taking care of dragons...
Don't worry about it. Taking care of them is for real men![end1]
My battle strategies will not be useful against these monsters. I shouldn't be a burden to you...[end]
[character][0x0]! Don't say that! He'll think you're jealous![end]
Matelite: Leave this to Palpaleos![end]
Matelite: [character][0x0]! When you're finished preparing, let's go![end]
Taicho: This is a gloomy castle... It smells full of danger.[end]
Taicho: The dragons seem different than normal! They are restless![end]
Sendak: Their eyes are glowing... I am scared.[end]
Sendak: Altair... I am scared...[end]
Rush: This is pretty fun, [character][0x0]![end]
Weapon Shop Armor Shop Item Shop[end1]
Rush: This isn't the time for business. Come see me later![end]
Rush: I'm suited to be a salesman...?[end]
Truce: Think in moderation...?[end]
Bikkebakke: Buy from me too, [character][0x0]![end]
Truce: So this is Altair... The Holy Dragons' homeland...[end]
Mushrooms Books Matelite-brand merchandise[end1]
Bikkebakke: You want mushrooms? In a little bit.[end]
[character][0x1]: We come from Orelus.[end]

......!?
I sense the spirits of the Holy Dragons...[end]
......Bahamut!? ...Valitora!? Garuda!![end]
Leviathan! Jormungand! Hyperion!![end]
What does this mean...?[end]
[character][0x1]: We've come to bring the Holy Dragons back to Altair. And... To defeat the monsters that would destroy Orelus...[end]
Monsters...... you mean them. But never mind that, where are the Holy Dragons?[end]
[character][0x1]: They're inside my mind...[end]
Then, you are a Dragnar!? One who can communicate with the Holy Dragons...[end]
[character][0x1]: ......Yes. ...And you are?[end]
...We are the Dragonites.[end]

Sendak: ......Dragonites.
Tell me, Dragonite. The Holy Dragons return to life with the aid of your kind. That is what I have heard, anyway. What does that mean?[end]

Humans from Orelus... So you still live...
So you were not wiped amidst the Holy Dragons' warring...
I shall tell you about we Dragonites and the Holy Dragons...
We Dragonites are the bodies of the Holy Dragons.
The Holy Dragons possess eternal life. Yet, there is still death... But, that is the death of flesh. A spirit of a Holy Dragon that has lost its flesh wanders aimlessly.
The wandering spirit of the Holy Dragon enters the body of a Dragonite and is thus revived. The revival of the Holy Dragons is the true happiness of we Dragonites![end]
Matelite: I get it already! Too many long stories! Hurry up and take the Holy Dragons' spirits from [character][0x1]![end]

...I cannot.
I fear I am too old, and the only remaining Dragonites are...[end]
We're just kids! Kids can't do it! We'd turn into violent dragons![end]

Dragnar of Orelus.
Can you not keep the Holy Dragons inside your mind as you are now?[end]

...Long ago, the humans of Orelus were able to read the minds of the Holy Dragons... The Holy Dragons lent the humans their own powers... To the weak-minded humans... The humans who were bestowed these powers quarreled amongst one another.
The Holy Dragons saw this and enjoyed it. Bahamut made himself the enemy of all the Holy Dragons and... Until the minds of the Holy Dragons and the humans closed...
The strong humans whose minds could connect with those of the Holy Dragons and yet would not lose their own mind upon gaining those powers... The Dragnars...
Now the revival of the Holy Dragons does not matter...
Please... Please hold the Holy Dragons for a little while longer...[end]
Long ago there were Dragonites who crossed over to Orelus, together with the Holy Dragons...[end]

The powers of the Holy Dragons changed the forms of the Dragonites...
However, the inherited memories of their homeland... Although dim they did not disappear...[end]
And the joy of returning...[end]
......? Are you the one named [character][0x0]?[end]
They have said to tell you something... They are words whose meaning I do not understand.[end]
THANK... YOU... I... LOVE... YOU...[end]
That is what they said.[end]
I'm still a kid so I can't be a dragon yet.[end]
Matelite: Hey! Kid! When do you become a dragon? Are there really no other Dragonites?[end]
If you go to Alexander Temple there should be some Dragonites...[end]
Matelite: Alexander?[end]
He's the king of Altair! The Holy Dragon Alexander![end]
It's a story from long ago, after Bahamut and the others had gone to Orelus.[end]
Alexander wanted to be ruler of Altair! That was the reason why he closed the door in the sky! So the other Holy Dragons couldn't come back.[end]
They say that he took many Dragonites to his temple. And that he then transformed them into mindless beasts![end]
[character][0x1]: The Holy Dragons...[end]
Bahamut: Dragonite... Answer me...[end]
Oh! Bahamut![end]

Bahamut: We have returned, so that we may be revived...
To usher in a new era, we have ventured through the door and returned...[end]
Valitora: Are you saying our revival matters not?[end]
I don't know! Grandpa! Grandpa![end]
Leviathan: The Dragonites... Are they still here?[end]
...Perhaps. Alexander would likely have some around for his own purposes.[end]

Garuda: Girl... You people who give this girl strength... For us, just this once...
Fight for our sake...[end]
Matelite: Hey, Holy Dragons! Don't be so happy![end]
Matelite: You made [character][0x1] suffer![end]
Matelite: We'd still fight even if you hadn't asked us! Fighting was the reason we came here!![end]

But know this! It wasn't for your sake! It was for ours!
Each one of us fights, hiding in our hearts things we can't say to anyone else![end]
Sendak: Matelite![end]
From where have you come...[end]
Palpaleos: I will try and speak with General Gudolf. A battle may be avoidable.[end]
Palpaleos: Let me go alone![end]
Matelite: General Palpaleos![end]
Matelite: I may hate you, but I'll tell you this![end]

Matelite: There is nothing you can take responsibility for by dying!
I'll never forgive you if you were to do something to make [character][0x1] sad!![end]
Taicho: [character][0x0]... I, too, have been wondering about that ionct wewarrived..[end][end]
